'''Instant Health''' is an instant [[status effect]] that increases [[health]] for players and living [[mob]]s and damages the [[undead]].

== Effect ==
Instantly heals {{hp|2}} × 2<sup>''level''</sup> or {{hp|3}} × 2<sup>''level''</sup>{{upcoming|java Combat Tests|nocat=1}}.
[[Undead]] mobs (including the [[wither]]) are [[damage]]d as if with [[Instant Damage]], instead. When applied using a [[lingering potion]], the entity is healed every second. Levels 30–32 (amplifiers 29–31) provide no healing<!-- due to overflow in the calculation-->. Levels outside the range 1–32 (corresponding to amplifiers 0–31) are used [[wikipedia:Modulo operation|modulo]] 32, making level 33 the same as level 1, etc.
